title: Germany of romance
brief_description: Accompanied by traditional music and the music of Wagner, Schumann, Brahms and Bach, the prospective tourist is shown the great man made and natural attractions of Germany and given glimpses of old and modern German life.
description: Accompanied by traditional music and the music of Wagner, Schumann, Brahms and Bach, the prospective tourist is shown the great man made and natural attractions of Germany and given glimpses of old and modern German life.
